divs: sighting detailsi was out in my garage and started to head out of my garage into the driveway when i noticed an object flying close to the ground right above me(helicopter hieght heading in a nw direction) without any sound, i thought it was strange but then i heard a jet getting real close and i was able to make out the engine flaps on the afterburner expand before the jet increased it's speed to catch up to the object, at that point i ran inside to get my girlfriend so she could see this, we ran back outside just to see the object (blinking a red light) and the jet following it head in a nw direction above the tree line go out of our line of sight. details: 9\10\2012 9:45pm about 1minute (time the event took before we could no longer see the object\jet) object shape: round shape *the object its self was dark, with one blinking red light (strobe effect, with a few pulses that weren't in sequence) *the red light was under the craft, no other lights were visible in my driveway at the front of my garage (was working in my garage when i stepped outside) * i was looking to the north and the direction of the object was "hovering" no sounds and quick and steady low to the ground in a nw direction the object was flying close to the ground at a helicopter level of flight, then i saw a jet about 5 seconds behind it close enough to the ground that i could see the afterburners and gear open slightly and go from orange to light yellow as it was starting to move faster towards the object. *it never changed course and i saw it until it went over some trees, both the jet following it and the object.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Gresham
There were no other sightings in Gresham on or around September 10th 2012
Summary: The UFO was 500ft or closer to the ground with a blinking red light
